attributes.action: Stop Crown Immunity Protecting Criminals In Public Office!...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop Misconduct In Public Office!

We the undersigned respectfully submit that Crown Immunity by virtue of the 'Memorandum Of Understanding' between The Association of Chief of Police Officers of England and Wales and The Law Society...be abolished due to the incompatability with & indirect conflict of The European Court of Human Rights(ECHR)


We the people humbly submit this petition inorder to highlight the incompatability of the 'Memorandum of Understanding' in direct conflict with The European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) &/or The Rule of Law...

Thank you

Yours Sincerely

Nadia Von Feldmeier

Human Rights Campaigner

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
